casebody.data:
Frank v. Metropolitan El. Ry. Co. et al. Fahrbach v. Same. Ludovici v. Same. Lubin v. Same. (Superior Court of New York City,

General Term.

March 14, 1892.) Appeal from special term. Separate actions by Sophia Frank, Barbara Fahrbach, Charles Ludovici, and Isaac Lubin, respectively, against the Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company and another. From a judgment for plaintiff in each case, defendants appeal. Affirmed.

Argued before Sedgwick, C. J., and Dugro and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Saekett & Bennett, for respondents. Dugro, J.

That there should be affirmance in these cases follows from Jordan v. Railway Co., 18 N. Y. Supp. 205, (decided at this term.) No errors requiring reversal appear in the admission of the evidence objected to in the Lubin and the Ludovici cases. Judgments affirmed, with costs. All concur.
